sentence.Network_cn: 索比离开了百老汇大街.

sentence.Network_en: Indeed , she embraces it in New York Rock, an off - Broadway musical aboutthe death of a one.

sentence.Network_en: After countless auditions , Willis finally made his theater debut in off - Broadway production of Heaven and Earth.

entry.tran: （剧院）外百老汇的，在百老汇附近的
entry.def: An off-Broadway theatre is located close to Broadway, the main theatre district in New York.

example.tran: 该市最负盛名的外百老汇剧院

entry.tran: （戏剧）外百老汇的，较少商业化的，更具实验性的
entry.def: An off-Broadway play is less commercial and often more unusual than those usually staged on Broadway.

example.ex: ...adapted from the off-Broadway stage show of the same name.
